data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Fashion merchandising is a multibillion-dollar industry that involves using marketing techniques and various products to sell clothing to consumers. The ____ that ____ influence ____ market ____ heavily ____ on ____ celebrities ____ wearing, ____ the ____ of ____ that ____ offer ____ consumers ____ carefully ____ out ____ appeal ____ a specific ____ due ____ price, ____, and ____ status. Merchandisers also must consider the needs and desires of their target market, determine which types of products are suitable, analyze consumer trends and competition, and develop a marketing plan to sell their products.
data.partBlankContent: Fashion merchandising is a multibillion-dollar industry that involves using marketing techniques and various products to sell clothing to consumers. The sty___ that mo__ influence t__ market a__ heavily depe_____ on wh__ celebrities a__ wearing, a__ the li___ of clot____ that desi_____ offer t_ consumers a__ carefully tho____ out t_ appeal t_ a specific audi____ due t_ price, des___, and soc___ status. Merchandisers also must consider the needs and desires of their target market, determine which types of products are suitable, analyze consumer trends and competition, and develop a marketing plan to sell their products.
data.answer: 时尚商品销售是一个数十亿美元的产业，包括使用营销技术和各种产品向消费者销售服装。对市场影响最大的款式很大程度上依赖于名人的穿着，设计师提供给消费者的服装都是经过仔细考虑的，以吸引特定的受众，因为价格、设计和社会地位。商家还必须考虑目标市场的需求和愿望，确定适合的产品类型，分析消费趋势和竞争情况，制定销售产品的营销计划。
